name: AngelKnightPrototype
description:
This is Angel Knight Prototype1. I've created this prototype to see if the dynamic between the angel and knight players is something worth pursuing further. Thanks for checking it out.

Special thanks to Visager  at freemusicarchive.org for the awesome open source soundtracks. Please check out his profile by following this link.

http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Visager/
